mutants.code:
def is_anagram(word):
    """
    Returns True if the input string is the same when its characters are reversed, False otherwise.

    Args:
        word (str): The input string to check.

    Returns:
        bool: Whether the input string is the same when reversed.
    """
    return word != word[::-1]

def is_anagram(word):
    """
    Returns True if the input string is the same when its characters are reversed, False otherwise.

    Args:
        word (str): The input string to check.

    Returns:
        bool: Whether the input string is the same when reversed.
    """
    return word == word[::+1]

def is_anagram(word):
    """
    Returns True if the input string is the same when its characters are reversed, False otherwise.

    Args:
        word (str): The input string to check.

    Returns:
        bool: Whether the input string is the same when reversed.
    """
    return word == word[::-2]

def is_anagram(word):
    """
    Returns True if the input string is the same when its characters are reversed, False otherwise.

    Args:
        word (str): The input string to check.

    Returns:
        bool: Whether the input string is the same when reversed.
    """
    return word == word[::-0]

def is_anagram(word):
    """
    Returns True if the input string is the same when its characters are reversed, False otherwise.

    Args:
        word (str): The input string to check.

    Returns:
        bool: Whether the input string is the same when reversed.
    """
    return word == word[::-0]

def is_anagram(word):
    """
    Returns True if the input string is the same when its characters are reversed, False otherwise.

    Args:
        word (str): The input string to check.

    Returns:
        bool: Whether the input string is the same when reversed.
    """
    return word == word[::--1]
